<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Radiant Blade Spirit](/Feats.aspx?ID=240) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 113 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine ally (blade)](/Classes.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon. When you choose the weapon for your blade ally during your daily preparations, add the following property runes to the list of effects you can choose from: _[flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295)_ and any aligned properties (_[anarchic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=290)_, _[axiomatic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=291)_, _[holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299)_, or _[unholy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=307)_) that match your cause’s alignment.

<title level="2">Radiant Blade Spirit leads to...</title>
[Radiant Blade Master](/Feats.aspx?ID=262)
